title: ABF maintains full-year guidance for operating profits
content:
(ShareCast News) – Associated British Foods continued to expect a decline in full-year operating profits, the company said in a pre-close trading update. 
Operating profits in Grocery, Agriculture, Ingredients and Retail would improve on a year ago, while Sugar was still set to register a fall. 
 
Together with the negative impact form a stronger pound the latter was expected to result in an overall decline in group profitability for the year. 
 
— More to follow —
